When it comes to holiday video game gifts, Nintendo gear is often at the top of the list for kids and adults like. This year likely more so than ever thanks to the launch of the [Switch 2](https://www.engadget.com/gaming/nintendo/nintendo-switch-2-review-more-of-what-you-love-120048430.html) back in the spring. But fi you were hoping to save money on the console with [Black Friday deals](https://www.engadget.com/deals/black-friday-deals-for-2025-are-here-early-we-found-the-best-sales-from-apple-amazon-lego-dyson-and-more-100052430.html), you may be disappointed. The Nintendo Black Friday sale was just [announced](https://www.nintendo.com/us/whatsnew/nintendo-announces-holiday-offers-for-black-friday-and-cyber-monday-2025/), and unsurprisingly, there are a scant few real "deals" to be had. This is typical of Nintendo, though — actual Nintendo Black Friday deals are few and far between. However, there are ways to at least get the best value for your money if you're going to pick up a Switch 2 before this year is over.

As has been the case for many years, the marquee Nintendo deals for the holidays come in the form of console bundles. When the Switch 2 launched earlier this year, it was available as just the [console only](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0F3GWXLTS&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=console+only&&signature=AQAAAYHBQAdHncRZUFbEpWxUOHtjyDqpm7RgA2DGIHGoJwva&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FNintendo-Switch-2-System%2Fdp%2FB0F3GWXLTS) for $449 or [bundled with _Mario Kart World_ for $499](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FC5FJZ9Z&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=bundled+with+Mario+Kart+World+for+%24499&&signature=AQAAAbQpAR5btsaKVS0LipKyLeAYQgyW3KnWsl7dbLbiKt61&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FNintendo-Switch-Mario-World-Bundle-2%2Fdp%2FB0FC5FJZ9Z%2F). Both options are still available now, but there's a new bundle to consider as well — the [console with the new _Pokémon Legends: Z-A_ game](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FJH6R8V3&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=console+with+the+new+Pok%C3%A9mon+Legends%3A+Z-A+game&&signature=AQAAAaX3lCxNlzYnf4IY5f4ifMlckJyq5mV45GbIkedvTOBS&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FNintendo-SwitchTM-Pok%2525C3%2525A9monTM-Legends-Switch-2%2Fdp%2FB0FJH6R8V3%2F), which also costs $499. Considering the games by themselves cost $70 each, you do save a bit by picking up a console bundle. you can pick up the console and its bundles at most retailers including [Amazon](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FC5FJZ9Z&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Amazon&&signature=AQAAAbQpAR5btsaKVS0LipKyLeAYQgyW3KnWsl7dbLbiKt61&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FNintendo-Switch-Mario-World-Bundle-2%2Fdp%2FB0FC5FJZ9Z%2F), [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_16422361549&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAARcZvpqp2Tzx9ZeGPv97tkCoKsglxx_uJwEeGZjEpJRb&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FNintendo-Switch-2-Mario-Kart-World-Bundle%2F16422361549), [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAATJX88U5FwJeLWDi080uSd5HWjU5MJqv8-hk0V7CG7vn&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fswitch-2-mario-kart-world-bundle-nintendo-switch-2%2FJ7GSL57HFZ) and others.

When it comes to deals on Nintendo Switch 2 games, the [Nintendo eShop](https://www.nintendo.com/au/hardware/nintendo-switch-2/featured-games/) will have Cyber Deals starting on November 20, running through December 3. The shop will feature "holiday offers on select games," so it appears we'll all just have to go to the online store on November 20 to see the games on offer.

Starting on November 23, select retailers will have discounts on some physical Switch games including [_Princess Peach: Showtime!_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0CJ3CKLRH&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Princess+Peach%3A+Showtime%21&&signature=AQAAATLUL7eSWKkdkpccv94dF2w3GIzFFZJ8Aqj6x34H27hV&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPrincess-PeachTM-Showtime-Version-Nintendo-Switch%2Fdp%2FB0CJ3CKLRH)_,_ [_The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0D8SDKKVW&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=The+Legend+of+Zelda%3A+Echoes+of+Wisdom&&signature=AQAAAdwX1AJ9WWfB8m6uybe3n92I7Lc5Mfh4PXKZkGp2Nouq&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FLegend-Zelda-Echoes-Wisdom-Nintendo-Switch%2Fdp%2FB0D8SDKKVW%2F)_,_ [_Luigi’s Mansion 3_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B07SK4W1VJ&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Luigi%E2%80%99s+Mansion+3&&signature=AQAAAQjb6D9xfJ1Ol_IuC6gCAh34RthmZbv-bZ2kQCKVnh8u&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FLuigis-Mansion-3-Nintendo-Switch%2Fdp%2FB07SK4W1VJ%2F) and [_Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0BF7XR94T&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Kirby%E2%80%99s+Return+to+Dream+Land+Deluxe&&signature=AQAAAZvZZJOjTsgPtJffFbVXqozyLsv471et3cdIwlFODw1D&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FKirbys-Return-Dream-LandTM-Deluxe-Nintendo%2Fdp%2FB0BF7XR94T%2F). Those will each be $40, while other games like [_Super Mario Odyssey,_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B01MY7GHKJ&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Super+Mario+Odyssey%2C&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1N1cGVyLU1hcmlvLU9keXNzZXktVVMtVmVyc2lvbi1Td2l0Y2gvZHAvQjAxTVk3R0hLSi8_&signature=AQAAASkJD9RgCP7KS_1dVo8CPAfjbw001SFCELMlTgOkQZkh&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSuper-Mario-Odyssey-US-Version-Switch%2Fdp%2FB01MY7GHKJ%2F) [_Nintendo Switch Sports_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B09KRK6C82&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Nintendo+Switch+Sports&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL05pbnRlbmRvLVN3aXRjaC1TcG9ydHMvZHAvQjA5S1JLNkM4Mi8_&signature=AQAAAec68iEa5EQm6NUh4n9DciMWObIQX2YiyntqCTF_Vro3&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FNintendo-Switch-Sports%2Fdp%2FB09KRK6C82%2F)_,_ [_Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0CXQ7N9Z6&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Paper+Mario%3A+The+Thousand-Year+Door&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BhcGVyLU1hcmlvLVRob3VzYW5kLVllYXItRG9vci1OaW50ZW5kby1Td2l0Y2gvZHAvQjBDWFE3TjlaNi8_&signature=AQAAAZQ3MZjNOOjonfG7KeXlfpLSKJLeWWEsg3mxA0wb9282&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPaper-Mario-Thousand-Year-Door-Nintendo-Switch%2Fdp%2FB0CXQ7N9Z6%2F) and [_Splatoon 3_](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_578169735&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=11936ab9-2878-4c46-a6cc-e53399939fde&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Splatoon+3&&signature=AQAAATDHdEJnFjDsYmKugmaiG0TG4Iq-EfmLoTaOm7iTQWHj&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FSplatoon-3-Nintendo-Switch-Physical-U-S-Version%2F578169735) will be $30.

Even if you can't get huge discounts on Nintendo consoles or new games this year, that doesn't mean you can't find decent deals on other Nintendo gear. There are plenty of great ideas for [gifts for the Nintendo fan in your life](https://www.engadget.com/gaming/nintendo/the-best-nintendo-gifts-for-the-2025-holiday-season-110057620.html), and Engadget's Sam Rutherford got to see a bunch of them in person when he attended Nintendo's holiday showcase. From collectibles to clothing to plushies and holiday decor, there's really a ton to choose from — but you may want to pace yourself if you're also a Nintendo fan finding things that you want to pick up for yourself in the process of looking for good gifts. Here are just some of the best Nintendo gift ideas that you can look out for during Black Friday and Cyber Monday.
